name: Bullet Harvest
description:
Start off in your farm with some seeds and bullets. Plant your seeds to grow more bullets. Fighting Big Corn will drop extra bullets to continue the fight and corn which will be sold and converted into seeds in the farming stage. Bullets reset after the combat stage so you can’t hoard them!


Farming Stage:

Combat Stage:

Controls:

Left Mouse Button to shoot

WASD to move about

Spacebar and a direction to dash

E to harvest and plant

ESC to quit
